attributes.action: Ensure troops returning on leave do not have their travelling time counted as part of their leave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Troops returning home for leave have to count their travelling time as part of their leave. From postings in areas such as Iraq and Afghanistan this can take several days. It is a national disgrace that our servicemen and women are risking their lives on our behalf and have to suffer this shabby treatment, losing precious time with their familes.
